attributes.action: extend the voting rights of British expats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that British citizens living abroad should no longer loose their voting rights after 15 years absence from the UK. The right to vote is fundemental and it is not because we as British citizens living abroad should become second class citizens.As EU citizens living in other EU member state we only have the right to vote in our respective country's of residence for the Council and European Elections. Many of us request the possibilty to vote in our country of residence rather than our country of origin.
